name: BURGERPUNK
description:
made for 7DFPS 2020

Complete online orders for Deliverübereatz in a post-burgerpunk dystopian future. 

Travel the multiverse and collect ingredients for your UNIQUE AND ORIGINAL RECIPES.

Visit exciting multiverses including: Cloudland, the second one? (with cubes) and b̸͙͆͗͐a̴̦͉̾̅͂͘ṛ̶̢̡̳̞̳̀̈n̶̡̳̹̘̄̀͐i̷̠̰̪͑̋ė̵̛͚͖̘̲̃̈́̕

Featuring Keanyu Wests as Jimmy Hotdoghands ( yoU'RE BEST FRIEND !!!!!)

disclaimer: I didn't actually test this build and there are several pretty awful bugs I couldn't fix in time. But it's playable and cool !

ALSO: we used unity HDRP so it kinda requires quite modern hardware, I'm running a gtx660 and it doesn't get 60fps at 1080p, Lewis runs 980ti, a 24 core processor and 37gb of RAM and it runs great though!
